name="chrRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>청구목록_배열건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="chrList" type="tns:CHR_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>청구목록_배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="CHR_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> <element name="stlmDay"> <annotation> <documentation>결제일</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp
